documents.document: @poloconghaile one my dad's favourite ways to end an evening at the pub. V. difficult to find Barley wine outside of Kilkenny and county.
@poloconghaile Pint of Guinness, when half way through get a bottle of Smithwicks barley wine and slowly pour into remaining pint. Drink!
